name: Whack The Pink Poodles
description:
Time is running... you got one minute to hit the four members of the funky bluesrock band 'Pink Poodle On Tropical Island'.  Try to  whack them multiple times as they appear.

But beware: don't hit Crody. 

You can play it in  two modes of difficulty - easy and pro.

Have fun and set up the new highscore :-)
developers: Pink Poodle On Tropical Island Games
